text: Joseph Sonny West (July 30, 1937 â€“ September 8, 2022) was an American rock songwriter and musician. He was best known as the co-writer of two of Buddy Holly's best known songs; "Oh, Boy!" and "Rave On". West died in Grove, Oklahoma on September 8, 2022, at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American rock guitarists Category:American rock singers Category:Singer-songwriters from Texas Category:People from Lubbock, Texas
title: Sonny West (musician)
